1: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> שְׁמַע־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> קוֹלִ֣י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>my voice</n> בְשִׂיחִ֑י <sup>7879 </sup> <n>in my prayer</n> מִפַּ֥חַד <sup>6343 </sup> <n>from fear</n> א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>of the enemy</n> תִּצֹּ֥ר <sup>5341 </sup> <n>preserve</n> חַיָּֽי׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>my life</n>
2: תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <sup>5641 </sup> <n>Hide</n> מִסּ֣וֹד <sup>5475 </sup> <n>me from the secret counsel</n> מְרֵעִ֑ים <sup>7489 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> מֵ֝רִגְשַׁ֗ת <sup>7285 </sup> <n>from the insurrection</n> פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <sup>6466 </sup> <n>of the workers</n> אָֽוֶן׃ <sup>205 </sup> <n>of iniquity</n>
3: אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> שָׁנְנ֣וּ <sup>8150 </sup> <n>Who whet</n> כַחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>like a sword</n> לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>their tongue</n> דָּרְכ֥וּ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>[and] bend</n> חִ֝צָּ֗ם <sup>2671 </sup> <n>[their bows to shoot] their arrows</n> דָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>words</n> מָֽר׃ <sup>4751 </sup> <n>[even] bitter</n>
4: לִיר֣וֹת <sup>3384 </sup> <n>That they may shoot</n> בַּמִּסְתָּרִ֣ים <sup>4565 </sup> <n>in secret</n> תָּ֑ם <sup>8535 </sup> <n>at the perfect</n> פִּתְאֹ֥ם <sup>6597 </sup> <n>suddenly</n> יֹ֝רֻ֗הוּ <sup>3384 </sup> <n>do they shoot</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִירָֽאוּ׃ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>at him and fear</n>
5: יְחַזְּקוּ־ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>They encourage</n> לָ֨מוֹ ׀ דָּ֘בָ֤ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>matter</n> רָ֗ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>themselves [in] an evil</n> יְֽ֭סַפְּרוּ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>they commune</n> לִטְמ֣וֹן <sup>2934 </sup> <n>privily</n> מוֹקְשִׁ֑ים <sup>4170 </sup> <n>snares</n> אָ֝מְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>they say</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יִרְאֶה־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Who shall see</n> לָּֽמוֹ׃
6: יַֽחְפְּֽשׂוּ־ <sup>2664 </sup> <n>They search out</n> עוֹלֹ֗ת <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquities</n> תַּ֭מְנוּ <sup>8552 </sup> <n>they accomplish</n> חֵ֣פֶשׂ <sup>2664 </sup> <n>a diligent</n> מְחֻפָּ֑שׂ <sup>2665 </sup> <n>search</n> וְקֶ֥רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>both the inward</n> אִ֝֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[thought] of every one</n> וְלֵ֣ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>[of them] and the heart</n> עָמֹֽק׃ <sup>6013 </sup> <n>[is] deep</n>
7: וַיֹּרֵ֗ם <sup>3384 </sup> <n>shall shoot</n> אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>But God</n> חֵ֥ץ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>at them [with] an arrow</n> פִּתְא֑וֹם <sup>6597 </sup> <n>suddenly</n> הָ֝י֗וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מַכּוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>4347 </sup> <n>shall they be wounded</n>
8: וַיַּכְשִׁיל֣וּהוּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>to fall</n> עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is against</n> לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>So they shall make their own tongue</n> יִ֝תְנֹדֲד֗וּ <sup>5074 </sup> <n>them shall flee away</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> רֹ֥אֵה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>upon themselves all that see</n> בָֽם׃
9: וַיִּֽירְא֗וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>shall fear</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אָ֫דָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>And all men</n> וַ֭יַּגִּידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and shall declare</n> פֹּ֥עַל <sup>6467 </sup> <n>the work</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥הוּ <sup>4639 </sup> <n>of his doing</n> הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <sup>7919 </sup> <n>for they shall wisely consider</n>
10: יִשְׂמַ֬ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>shall be glad</n> צַדִּ֣יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>The righteous</n> בַּ֭יהוָה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְחָ֣סָה <sup>2620 </sup> <n>and shall trust</n> ב֑וֹ וְ֝יִתְהַֽלְל֗וּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>shall glory</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יִשְׁרֵי־ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>in him and all the upright</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in heart</n>
